title: Code Style Guidelines
content: A comprehensive set of coding standards including: imports ordered as stdlib → third-party → local; type annotations using typing hints (Dict, List, Optional, Any); error handling with specific exceptions and informative logging; snake_case for functions/variables and PascalCase for classes; docstrings for all classes/functions; configured logger usage; configuration loaded from files with environment variable fallbacks; proper JSON error handling with sensible defaults; and maintenance of separation between implementations and templates.
summary: The canonical rules governing code written in the repository
